altername_name: ツクールシリーズ 武雷銃～GALAXY STORM～
name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Buraigun Galaxy Storm
overview: Buraigun Galaxy Storm is a vertically scrolling shooter that reminds you of a 90's arcade. You can use three types of weapons: "Wide Beam", "Thunder Laser", and "Spear Shot", and you can also switch between "Side Formation" and "Front Formation". Let's build your own strategy ! The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
